TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Panel extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

summary.span: 表示作为其他控件的容器的控件。

span.span: Represents a control that acts as a container for other controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件是其他控件的容器。The control is a container for other controls. 当你想要以编程方式生成控件、 隐藏/显示的一组控件，或本地化的一组控件时，它是特别有用。It is especially useful when you want to generate controls programmatically, hide/show a group of controls, or localize a group of controls. 属性可用于本地化要显示的语言编写从右到左，例如阿拉伯语或希伯来语的文本的控件的内容。The property is useful for localizing a control's content to display text for languages that are written from right to left, such as Arabic or Hebrew. 控件提供了可用于自定义的行为和显示其内容的多个属性。The control provides several properties that allow you to customize the behavior and display of its contents. 使用属性来显示的自定义映像控件。Use the property to display a custom image for the control. 使用属性来指定控件的滚动条。Use the property to specify scroll bars for the control. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用控件来以编程方式生成控件还可以隐藏/显示的一组控件。The following example illustrates the use of a control to generate controls programmatically and to hide/show a group of controls. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Panel Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Panel Example 2/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Panel Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Panel Example 2/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员。The method is used primarily by control developers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写中的自定义服务器控件的方法，以便文本始终显示为粗体。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the text always displays as bold. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性显示的自定义映像控件。Use this property to display a custom image for the control. 如果图像比小，它将平铺来填充。If the image is smaller than the , it will be tiled to fill in the . > [!NOTE] > 此属性是仅在支持 HTML 4.0 的浏览器上受支持或更高版本。This property is supported only on browsers that support HTML 4.0 or later. ## Examples 下面的示例说明了如何以编程方式设置属性的。The following example illustrates how to programmatically set the property of the . > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中包含的默认按钮的标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the identifier for the default button that is contained in the control.

value.span: 一个字符串值，对应于 中包含的按钮控件的 。

span.span: A string value corresponding to the for a button control contained in the .

value.span: 默认值为空字符串，指示 没有默认按钮。

span.span: The default is an empty string, indicating that the does not have a default button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以指示被单击的按钮控件具有焦点并且用户按下 ENTER 键。Use the property to indicate which button gets clicked when the control has focus and the user presses the ENTER key. 可以设置为的标识符控制或实现任何控件除接口控件。The can be set to the identifier for a control or any control that implements the interface except a control. 如果设置为控件不实现接口，或未包含在一个控件控件，控件将引发呈现时出现异常。If the is set to a control that does not implement the interface, or to a control that is not contained in the control, the control throws an exception while rendering. 设置属性不适用于以下方案：Setting the property is not supported for the following scenarios: - 外部输入控件的焦点设置在面板中，然后按 ENTER 键。Setting focus outside of the input controls in the panel and then pressing the ENTER key. 不能保证默认回发操作触发。The default post back action is not guaranteed to trigger. - 按 ENTER 键和多行文本框内的焦点。Pressing the ENTER key with focus inside a multi-line textbox. 在多行文本框中，按 ENTER 键应创建的新行中的文本框，这是预期的行为。In a multi-line textbox, pressing the ENTER key should create a new line in the textbox which is the expected behavior. 在浏览器中按 ENTER 键在多行文本框中触发器的文章，但您想要创建一个新行的 ENTER 键在改为可附加的 JavaScript 函数到输入控件。In browsers where the pressing the ENTER key inside a multi-line textbox triggers a post back but you want the ENTER key to create a new line instead you can attach a JavaScript function to the input control. 该脚本应捕获 ENTER 键，并停止回发。The script should capture the ENTER key and stop the post back. 例如，可以使用要添加为客户端脚本的属性集合`onKeyPress`事件。For example, you can use the property collection to add client script for the `onKeyPress` event. - 引用是默认按钮控件。Referencing a default button that is a control. 仅和控件都受支持。Only and controls are supported. - 更改以编程方式在异步 post 期间备份何时控件中的不是控件。Changing the programmatically during an asynchronous post back when the control is not inside of an control. 可以通过添加一个或多个页面上启用异步回发到页面的控件。Asynchronous post backs can be enabled on a page by adding one or more controls to the page. 控件可用于更新选定的区域，而不是使用回发中更新整个页面的页面。 controls can be used to update selected regions of a page instead of updating the whole page with a postback. 有关详细信息，请参阅[UpdatePanel 控件概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)并[部分页呈现概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). - 设置此属性的主题或样式表主题。Setting this property by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentDirection Direction { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentDirection Direction
Public Overridable Property Direction As ContentDirection

public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::ContentDirection Direction { System::Web::UI::WebControls::ContentDirection get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::ContentDirection value); };
member this.Direction : System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentDirection with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件中显示包含文本的控件的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction in which to display controls that include text in a control.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定包含中的文本的控件的显示方向控件。Use the property to specify the display direction for controls that include text in a control. 此属性使用其中一个设置枚举值。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未设置内容的方向。The content direction is not set.| |`LeftToRight`|内容的方向是从左到右。The content direction is left to right.| |`RightToLeft`|内容的方向为从右到左。The content direction is right to left.| 如果指定`LeftToRight`，包括文本的子控件将显示从左到右。If you specify `LeftToRight`, child controls that include text display from left to right. 如果指定`RightToLeft`，包含文本的子控件从右到左显示。If you specify `RightToLeft`, child controls that include text display right to left. 使用`RightToLeft`要显示的语言编写从右到左，例如阿拉伯语或希伯来语的文本。Use `RightToLeft` to display text for languages that are written from right to left, such as Arabic or Hebrew. > [!NOTE] > 此属性是仅在支持 HTML 4.0 的浏览器上受支持或更高版本。This property is supported only on browsers that support HTML 4.0 or later. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式设置属性。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically set the property. 一个控件中填充枚举值。A control is populated with the enumeration values. 面板更改，根据用户从列表框中选择的值中的标签和单选按钮的显示方向。The display direction of the label and radio buttons in the panel change, based on the value the user selects from the list box. 请注意，本示例使用英语文本。Note that this example uses English text. 因此，当`RightToLeft`选择了值，文本两端对齐的右侧维护控件，但英文文本从左到右顺序。Therefore, when the `RightToLeft` value is selected, the text is justified on the right side of the control, but the left-to-right order of the English text is maintained. 在实际应用程序中不会设置属性设置为`RightToLeft`如果您要显示从左到右语言的文本。In a real-world application you would not set the property to `RightToLeft` if you were displaying text for a left-to-right language. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-vb[Panel.Direction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Panel.Direction/VB/panel.directionvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置面板控件中包含的控件组的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the caption for the group of controls that is contained in the panel control.

value.span: 面板控件中包含的子控件的标题文本。

span.span: The caption text for the child controls contained in the panel control.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来显示框架和标题中包含的控件组控件。Use the property to display a frame and caption for the group of controls that is contained in the control. 的值使用 FIELDSET 和图例元素，HTML 4.0 规范中引入的呈现控件。The value of a control is rendered using the FIELDSET and LEGEND elements, which were introduced in the HTML 4.0 specification. 如果客户端浏览器使用 HTML 3.2不呈现值。If the client browser uses HTML 3.2, the value is not rendered. 请参阅客户端浏览器文档有关的字段集和图例元素的显示方式的详细信息。Refer to your client browser documentation for details on how the FIELDSET and LEGEND elements are displayed. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于指定中的元素的对齐方式。Use this property to specify the alignment of the elements in the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何右对齐或左对齐内的控件。The following example illustrates how to right-align or left-align the controls within the . > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Panel.HorizontalAlign Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Panel.HorizontalAlign Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Panel.HorizontalAlign Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Panel.HorizontalAlign Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的可见性和位置的滚动条中控件。Use the property to specify the visibility and position of scroll bars in a control. 此属性使用其中一个设置枚举值。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`None`|不显示任何滚动条。No scroll bars are shown.| |`Horizontal`|显示水平滚动条。Only a horizontal scroll bar is shown.| |`Vertical`|显示垂直滚动条。Only a vertical scroll bar is shown.| |`Both`|同时显示水平滚动条和垂直滚动条。Both horizontal and vertical scroll bars are shown.| |`Auto`|如有必要，水平、 垂直或这两个滚动条显示。If necessary, horizontal, vertical, or both scroll bars are shown. 要不然也可以不显示任何滚动条。Otherwise, no scroll bars are shown.| 如果指定`Auto`有关属性，显示滚动条自动时中的内容的大小控件超出了大小的控件本身。If you specify `Auto` for the property, scroll bars are automatically shown when the size of the content in a control exceeds the size of the control itself. 例如，如果控件包含一个表，并且面板不足以在表中显示的所有行，显示垂直滚动条。For example, if a control contains a table, and the panel is not wide enough to display all the rows in the table, a vertical scroll bar is shown. 如果表的大小超过的高度和宽度的面板，显示这两个垂直和水平滚动条。If the size of the table exceeds the height and width of the panel, both vertical and horizontal scroll bars are shown. > [!NOTE] > 此属性是仅在支持 HTML 4.0 的浏览器上受支持或更高版本。This property is supported only on browsers that support HTML 4.0 or later. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式设置属性设置为`Auto`。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property to `Auto`. 在面板包含一个表，其整个内容超过面板的大小。The panel contains a table, the entire contents of which exceed the size of the panel. 这会导致这两个垂直和水平滚动条来呈现面板时自动显示。This causes both vertical and horizontal scroll bars to be automatically displayed when the panel is rendered. 然后，用户可以滚动以查看表中的所有数据。The user can then scroll to view all the data in the table. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Panel.Scrollbars#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Panel.Scrollbars/CS/panel.scrollbarscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Panel.Scrollbars#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Panel.Scrollbars/VB/panel.scrollbarsvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式设置属性。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically set the property. 一个控件中填充枚举值。A control is populated with the enumeration values. 面板更改，根据用户从列表框中选择的值中显示的滚动条。The scroll bars displayed in the panel change, based on the value the user selects from the list box. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Panel.Scrollbars2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Panel.Scrollbars2/CS/panel.scrollbars2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Panel.Scrollbars2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Panel.Scrollbars2/VB/panel.scrollbars2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于4.0; 否则为。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示如何 ASP.NET 应呈现 HTML 控件的控件处于禁用状态时。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为`true`，ASP.NET 会将`disabled`属性时控件处于禁用状态。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为`false`，ASP.NET 会将`class`属性时控件处于禁用状态。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来包装的内容。Use this property to wrap the contents of the . ## Examples 下面的示例说明了如何以编程方式设置属性的控件。The following example illustrates how to programmatically set the property of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
